price: 19. Raac sida toosan ee dhexdhexaadka ah xagga socodkaaga, hoosna u dhig codkaaga. Hubaal kan ugu xun codadka waa cida dameeraha.
arabic: وَٱقۡصِدۡ فِي مَشۡيِكَ وَٱغۡضُضۡ مِن صَوۡتِكَۚ إِنَّ أَنكَرَ ٱلۡأَصۡوَٰتِ لَصَوۡتُ ٱلۡحَمِيرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-iq'ṣid fī mashyika wa-ugh'ḍuḍ min ṣawtika inna ankara al-aṣwāti laṣawtu al-ḥamīri
